title: German Chancellor Angela Merkel’s handpicked successor will not run for the CDU
text: The head of Germany's ruling Christian Democrats was supposed to succeed Chancellor Angela Merkel as the next leader of Germany. However, she no longer plans to run in the 2021 general elections. Yahoo Finance’s Oscar Willams-Grut joins On the Move with the details.
